On April 21st and 22nd our social media channels will not be staffed and our Sales Center will remain closed. 
We will be at your complete disposal until Saturday the 20th April til 5pm. 
For assistance: https://t.co/xrBI3IKAnD

Happy Easter! 🐣

data.text: @heimuuh Good afternoon dear Heimo! Kids seats as the one showed in the pic are allowed on board as extra luggage (in addition to regular luggage) as long as it is suitable for aircrafts. If not, it will be checked-in as normal luggage and loaded in the cargo.
@GaiusTacitus ✈️Dear Czar, we are always here for our passengers 😊 We will forward your nice words to the dpts involved. Best/Laure
@kumicov You have to 😊✈️ Italy and the Dolomiti are well worth a visit!

data.text: @madmanfoggy Dear Foggy Fan, we truly apologize for the inconvenience. In order to help you further and check could you kindly send us via DM flight details as number and day? Looking forward to hearing from you. BR/Laure

@KCiapala Hi Chris! Sorry for our late feedback, but would you be so kind to send us a DM with your details (name, surname, PRN or ticket number)? We'll forward them internally by Monday morning. Thanks for contacting us here. BR/Michaela

data.text: #Pratello is an area in #Bologna's old town that centres on a single large porticoed street. Exploring that street means immersing yourself in the most subversive, authentic and avant-garde neighbourhood in the Emilian capital: https://t.co/xlekhN5Dgx #AlternativeGuide #streetart https://t.co/npP1Fgzqbh
